title: Enhancing Creativity by Deferring Judgement
summary: If you're looking for creative solutions to difficult problems, deferring judgement is one simple trick that can help.
long_summary: Though people generally desire becoming more creative, it's hard to know where to start. After all, "creativity" can be a bit of a nebulous topic. However, I've found that one small trick, deferring judgement, can get you a long way there.
